Good form.feedback: Correct - Good Form: The shape of the vase clearly demonstrates craftsmanship.

Poor taste.feedback: Incorrect - Poor Taste: Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer.

Contrasting themes.feedback: Incorrect - Contrasting Themes: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.

AI.feedback: Correct - AI: While a modification of prior work, this is still AI generative work.

Shading.feedback: Incorrect - Shading: While there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching.

Original work.feedback: Incorrect - Original Work: Artwork created from gerenateive AI can not be original since it is trained on other artists work.

Accessible.feedback: Incorrect - Accessible: The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.

Bald.feedback: Correct - Cop is bald, oh wait maybe he isnt

Is a cute dog.feedback: Incorrect - Is a dog but that little rat is not cute

Wearing shades.feedback: Correct - Has nice shades so the cop cannot see that he may be under the influence

Red Car.feedback: Correct - Dog led high speed chase in red convertible

4K image.feedback: Incorrect - Looks to be taken on a Potato

Violence.feedback: Incorrect - No violence, cop looks like he just wants to pet the lil guy

Accessible.feedback: Incorrect - Accessible: The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.
